name: Big Red Beauty
description: Big Red Beauty is a beauty services listing directory for Cornell students! Our goal is to connect Cornell students who can perform beauty services like gel-x nails, haircuts, braiding, eyebrow threading, etc. to Cornell students looking for them. We want to make it easier for students on campus to access beauty services in terms of location and prices.

name: Annie's Food Blog
description: Annie's Food Blog was my final project for INFO 1998: Trends in Web Development. I wanted to create a personal website where I could display, rate, and favorite various dishes I've consumed over the years. I wanted to make it almost like a digital scrapbook for my foodie experiences over the years.
